meta.name: Send candidate outcome emails and SMS and notify referrers with Airtable

nodes.name: Airtable Trigger — Info Outcome Updated At1

parameters.subject: Course Place Confirmed
parameters.textContent:
=Hi {{ $json.firstName || $json.fields['First Name'] }},

Thank you for attending the info event at [course name].

We are pleased to confirm that your place on the course is secure, and we look forward to welcoming you on Monday.

If you have changed your mind for any reason, please let us know as soon as possible by emailing sender@gmail.com

Your name

={{
  $json.courseOutcomeKey === 'started'
    ? `Hi ${$json.firstName || 'there'},

Welcome to the coursename, Course name at Academy name.

We are pleased to confirm that you have successfully started the course and wish you every success.

If you have any questions during the course, please get in touch.

sendername`
    : $json.courseOutcomeKey === 'not_started_withdrawn'
      ? `Hi ${$json.firstName || 'there'},

We noticed that you did not start or withdrew from the Course name.

If you would like to join a future course or discuss your options, please contact us as soon as possible.

sendername`
      : $json.courseOutcomeKey === 'completed'
        ? `Hi ${$json.firstName || 'there'},

Congratulations on successfully completing the Course name.

We wish you every success moving forward and thank you for training with coursename.

sendername`
        : `Hi ${$json.firstName || 'there'},

Course update.

sendername`
}}

={{`Hello,

This is an update regarding your referred candidate ${$json.firstName || ''}.

Course Outcome: $json.fields['Course Outcome']

sendername`}}

parameters.subject: Candidate Info Event Outcome

parameters.content:
## Candidate outcomes and referrer notifications

## How it works

This workflow automates post-event and post-course communications for candidates, while also notifying referring partners at the correct milestones.

The workflow is triggered when Airtable updates timestamp fields related to Info Event Outcomes or Course Outcomes. Airtable controls when the workflow runs, and n8n controls what happens next. This separation avoids race conditions and keeps the system reliable.

Once triggered, the workflow normalizes record data and determines exactly one action path using a centralized Code node. Based on the outcome, it sends the appropriate candidate email and SMS, and optionally notifies the referring person. Each message is sent only once using checkbox “sent” flags stored in Airtable.

## Setup steps

Connect Airtable and select the table containing candidate records.

Ensure Airtable includes timestamp fields for outcome updates.

Ensure all “sent” fields are checkbox fields.

Connect your email and SMS providers.

Customize message content in the Email and SMS nodes if needed.

## Trigger & Event Detection
Watches Airtable-managed timestamp fields for outcome changes.
Airtable controls when the workflow runs.

## Normalize & Decide Action
Central logic layer that normalizes fields and outputs one action path.
Prevents fragile IF chains.

## Candidate Messaging — Info Event Outcomes
Handles post-info-event emails and SMS for attended and no-show outcomes.
Each message is sent once only.

## Candidate Messaging — Course Outcomes

Sends course outcome messages (started, withdrawn, completed).
Content is driven by normalized outcome keys.

## Referrer Notifications
Notifies referring partners when candidates progress or exit the course.
Runs independently from candidate messaging.

## Commit Flags & Complete
Writes “sent” flags back to Airtable and ends the workflow.
Guarantees idempotency across retries.

parameters.subject: Course Update
parameters.textContent:
=Hi {{ $json.firstName || $json.fields['First Name'] }},

As you did not attend the info event at course name, you have been removed from the course list.

If you would still like to join a future course, please contact us as soon as possible by calling or texting +12345678.

sender name

main.node: Airtable — Commit Course Outcome Message Sent1
